platform that implements the credit workflow process of Banif (one of Portuguese main banks):"]}],["$","ul","2",{"children":[["$","li","0",{"className":"list-disc ml-md mt-xs","children":["Account managers on any branch could start the process by creating a new proposal for a client;"]}]]}],["$","ul","3",{"children":[["$","li","0",{"className":"list-disc ml-md mt-xs","children":["A proposal would then be sent for evaluation by a bank analyst;"]}]]}],["$","ul","4",{"children":[["$","li","0",{"className":"list-disc ml-md mt-xs","children":["After analysis the proposal would pass by a decision process where it could suffer some changes. This process could be composed by one or more decision levels. The number of levels was dependent on the client situation and proposal conditions. On each level there were two or three users that could suggest changes and if both agreed they would pass to the next level."]}]]}],["$","ul","5",{"children":[["$","li","0",{"className":"list-disc ml-md mt-xs","children":["The results of the decision process would determine if the proposal was authorized or not."]}]]}],["$","ul","6",{"children":[["$","li","0",{"className":"list-disc ml-md mt-xs","children":["Independently of the decision result, the proposal would be sent back to the account manager that created it so he could present it to the client who would then decide to accept or refuse."]}]]}],["$","p","7",{"className":"mt-sm","children":["For each new proposal created, the system would load client information from the Central Database of the Portuguese Bank (BdP). The user pools for each phase of the process would be loaded from the internal bank databases, and if a proposal was approved by the bank it would be stored there."]}],["$","p","8",{"className":"mt-sm","children":["Technologies used: WebSphere (IBM BPM 8.0.1 and IBM ODM 8.0.1), JavaScript (Client and Server side), jQuery, Dojo, Twitter Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, XML, JSON, Java, and Microsoft SQL Server."]}]]]}]}],["$","li","1",{"children":["$","article",null,{"children":[["$","header",null,{"className":"flex items-center justify-between mb-sm","children":[["$","div",null,{"children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"font-bold mb-xs text-2xl","children":"Google Chrome Extension - Web Inspector"}],"$undefined"]}],"$undefined"]}],null,[["$","p","1",{"className":"mt-sm","children":["Chrome extension that allows users to inspect a web page contents and properties by clicking on certain page elements.
